Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute near Ashland/Congress
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Ashland/Congress.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland, Harrison, Damen, Jackson and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Van Buren, Damen, Harrison and Ashland, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Reroute at Central/Division
ShortDescription: #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to fire department activity near Central/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Central, Division, Austin, North Ave., and Central, over normal route, due to fire department activity near Central/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier delay at Sox-35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier delay at Sox-35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
